definitions.definition: Of or pertaining to the ancient region on the Upper Tigris river, with capital city of Assur.
Of, or characteristic of, or pertaining to the ancient nation and empire, including the northern half of Mesopotamia, with capital city of Nineveh.
Of or pertaining to the Assyrian people.

main_definition: ( historical ) Of or pertaining to the ancient region on the Upper Tigris river, with capital city of Assur.
secondary_definitions: ( historical ) Of, or characteristic of, or pertaining to the ancient nation and empire, including the northern half of Mesopotamia, with capital city of Nineveh.
Of or pertaining to the Assyrian people.
